means: （书、报、杂志等的）一版印刷总数

sentence.Network_en: The American edition of "Cloud Street" is already in its third printing.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国版的《云街》已经是第三次印刷了。

sentence.Network_en: I enjoy the omnibus edition of Eastenders on Sunday.
sentence.Network_cn: 我喜欢看《伦敦东区》的周日连播版。

sentence.Network_en: A pirated edition of the book was published in August 1986.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书的一个盗版版本在1986年8月出版。

编辑框(Edit)控件实际上是一个简易的文本编辑器，用户可以在编辑框中输入可添加或插入文本。还有复制、粘贴、剪切、删除等编辑 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French édition, from Latin editio(n-), from edere 'put out', from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + dare 'give'

entry.def: An edition is a particular version of a book, magazine, or newspaper that is printed at one time.

example.ex: A paperback edition is now available at bookshops.
example.tran: 平装本现在在书店可以买到。

entry.tran: (书或报纸的)一次印刷量，版次
entry.def: An edition is the total number of copies of a particular book or newspaper that are printed at one time.

example.ex: The second edition was published only in America.

entry.tran: （电视或广播节目的）一集，一期
entry.def: An edition is a single television or radio programme that is one of a series about a particular subject.

example.ex: They appeared on an edition of BBC2's Arena.
example.tran: 他们在英国广播公司二台《竞技场》的一期节目中亮相。

means.word_mean: 1. the form in which a text (especially a printed book) is published
2. all of the identical copies of something offered to the public at the same time;

sentences.sentence: "it was too late for the morning edition"
"they issued a limited edition of Bach recordings"
"he read it in yesterday's edition of the Times"

means.word_mean: 4. something a little different from others of the same type;

sentences.sentence: "an experimental version of the night fighter"
"an emery wheel is a modern variant of the grindstone"
"the boy is a younger edition of his father"

auth_sentence.content: That was yesterday morning's edition of BBC Breakfast.
auth_sentence.res_content: That was yesterday morning's edition of BBC Breakfast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That was yesterday morning's edition of BBC Breakfast.

auth_sentence.content: It was the first collected edition of his works.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was the first collected edition of his works.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was the first collected edition of his works.

auth_sentence.content: Both books have been entirely reset for this edition.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both books have been entirely reset for this edition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both books have been entirely reset for this edition.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 允许进入,承认某事之陈述,供认
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+miss送+ion动作或状态等→送来→许可进入
concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁
console安慰+at+ion动作或状态等→n.安慰,慰藉
contradict反驳,矛盾+ion动作或状态等→n.反驳,矛盾
create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
stems_affixes.word_buile: discriminate歧视+ion动作或状态等→n.辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力
lucubrate用功,深入研究+ion动作或状态等→n.刻苦研究

stems_affixes.value_cn: 航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
stems_affixes.word_buile: navigate航行,航海,导航+ion动作或状态等→n.航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
obligate有责任的+ion动作或状态等→n.义务,责任
obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰
pollute弄脏,污染+ion动作或状态等→污染,玷污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: possess占有,拥有+ion动作或状态等→n.持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[n.]财产,财富
receipt收据,收到+ion动作或状态等→n.接待,招待会,接收
situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

Sentence.sentence: The shortcomings of traditional print edition textbooks are obvious: For starters they're heavy, with the average physics textbook weighing 3.06 pounds.
they are not reused once a new edition comes out
The American Psychiatric Association may consider listing Internet addiction in the next edition of its diagnostic manual.

Outside the US, Google has made sure only to scan books that are out of copyright and thus in the "public domain" (works such as the Bodleian's first edition of Middle march, which anyone can read for free on Google Books Search).
Good evening and welcome to tonight's edition of Legendary Lives.

jushi.english: His son was a pocket edition of himself.
jushi.chinese: 他的儿子简直就是他的袖珍版。

jushi.english: The book is entering upon its third edition.
